score: 2 out of 2 people found the following review useful
review: Divorcing Jack is such a really good movie, funny but yet with a story-line set in a real but happy Northern Ireland, or the North of Ireland, or the Province, or Ulster or the Six Counties, whichever you choose.One not to miss!
